# Leaflet

You can also create interactive maps that support panning, zooming and
annotations.

```{r, comment = NA}
library(leaflet)

## Read farm data
farms <- read.csv("farm_level.csv")

## Create leaflet map
m <- leaflet()
m <- addTiles(m)
m <- addCircleMarkers(m,
                      lng   = farms$long,
                      lat   = farms$lat,
                      popup = paste("Herd id: ", farms$herd),
                      color = ifelse(farms$coli_vac == 1, "green", "red"),
                      fill  = TRUE)
m
```
